item.description:
Let's try Snooker's in Providence as the location for the next Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour. They have extensive and yummy food and drink menus. If there is interest we can always stay for a while and rent a few pool tables - the cost is $10 per hour. Please check out their website: http://www.snookersri...

Come out for good food, drinks and great conversation with fellow members of the Rhode Island Atheist Society!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll get there early to get tables together.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Happy Hour(s) and Pool - October 5, 2010
